name: Superior Solitaire
description:
Superior Solitaire is a straight-forward card game collection with no in-app purchases, no tracking, and no advertising. The current release supports Canfield, FreeCell, Golf, Klondike, Pyramid, Scorpion, Towers, TriPeaks, Westcliff, and Yukon Solitaires.

Features:

- Draw-one and draw-three modes
- Infinite levels of undo
- Optional large print cards for those with special needs
- Optional auto completion
- Optional sound-effects
- Optional background graphics
